requirement.topic: Clients can be notified about other clients login or logout events
requirement.description: There are two internal messages which hold login and logout events. You can subscribe to "__sys__Login" to be notified when a new client logs in, and to "__sys__Logout" to be notified when a client logs out. The message content contains the unique login name of this client.
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de
